Surround with equally rich colours, tempering with soft creams and neutrals as needed. You'll end up with a warm and cosy room full of rich colour and character.

products.title: Evenfall Dusky Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Look at all that gorgeous texture on this evenfall dusky blue roman blind. The base fabric is awash with beautifully woven threads in rich, navy blue. Surrounded on three sides by a charcoal border, it's the height of sophistication. The skinny border frames things nicely to give look at all that gorgeous texture on this evenfall dusky blue roman blind.

products.title: Woodland, Saxon Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: You'll love the gorgeously abstract blue tones of the misty woodland in saxon blue. The occasional sage green and pale dove grey is there to accent, and the imagery sits on a clean white background for contrast. Add the saxon blue to a downstairs cloakroom or utility to give the room a cool hue by painting the room a soft white and accessorising with blues and greens. To go along with the woodland theme, add some foliage or wildflower wall art to boot.

products.title: William Morris Acorn Soft Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Part of their collaboration with the v&a, this william morris designed acorn soft blue roman blind truly transcends the times. The beautifully classic soft blue tone is a great choice if youre looking to create a fresh and contemporary scheme with a touch of historic appeal.

products.title: Kensington, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: The grey-toned navy blue that forms the background for the bold and vivacious kensington navy is rich and appealing, whilst the colours it boasts, in indigo, ocean, and petrol blues, plus varying shades of green, truly pop from the fabric. Hang the navy as part of a grand yet contemporary dining room, where darker woods rule and drama takes pride of place. Accent the room with matching aqua blues and hot fuchsia, using them to bring out the rich tones of the blind.

products.title: Camden, Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: An abstract depiction of blue, aqua, and teal blossoms, the camden in blue offers a striking array of hues, with a cool and arty aesthetic. It's part-linen make-up means the fabric is light yet hardwearing, giving you a blind that will stand the test of time. Hang the blue in a contemporary living room, where wooden floorboards take centre stage and white walls show off bursts of blue and green colour in the form of wall art.

products.title: Chimera Purity Blue Roman Blind
products.description: What could possibly be more serene that this delivery of serenity blue bordering the softest of off-white tones, coming all together to create chimera purity blue. And pure this roman blind truly is, with linen textures throughout as well as a whole host of softness. Team with what could possibly be more serene that this delivery of serenity blue bordering the softest of off-white tones, coming all together to create chimera purity blue.

products.title: Kent, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: With its military connotations, the colour navy is a force to be reckoned with. The classic kent fabric, with its plush, chenille texture, adds a softness and sense of cosiness to the colour, resulting in a stylish and appealing blind. Settle the navy against white or cream walls in the living room or master bedroom, matching it to other, differently textured fabrics throughout the room. Accent with a rich, saffron yellow to make the navy truly pop, and you have yourself an attractive, on-trend colour scheme.

products.title: Accents Navy Roman Blind
products.description: Navy and cream, it's a combination that works so well and not just in a nautical theme (though we love that thought too), it's a timeless pairing that will enhance any room in your home. The lightness of the cream keeps your home feeling bright and spacious while the dark navy ad navy and cream, it's a combination that works so well and not just in a nautical theme (though we love that thought too), it's a timeless pairing that will enhance any room in your home.

products.title: Manor Navy Roman Blind
products.description: As you could probably guess from the name, this roman blind is born for manor houses, with the combination of a traditional linen roman blind and gorgeous navy blue borders. Its this teaming of textures that allows the manor navy to bring a softer touch to your windows, dress as you could probably guess from the name, this roman blind is born for manor houses, with the combination of a traditional linen roman blind and gorgeous navy blue borders.
